00037 void EventManager::setNumberOfEvents(unsigned int num)
00038 {
00039 
00040     freeEvents();

00043

00051 void EventManager::unregisterEventCallback(unsigned int event, EventCallback* Cb)
00052 {
00053     if (event >= m_numEvents) return;
00054 
00055     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->size(); i++)
00056     {
00057         if (m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->at(i) == Cb)
00058         {
00059             m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->erase(m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->begin() + i);
00060             return;
00061         }
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void EventManager::registerEventCallback(unsigned int event, EventCallback * Callback)
00066 {
00067     if (event >= m_numEvents) return;
00068 
00069     m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->push_back(Callback);
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 void EventManager::triggerEvent(unsigned int event, std::vector<int> EData, int Flags)
00074 {
00075     if (event >= m_numEvents) return;
00076 
00077     size_t loop_len = m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->size();
00078 
00079     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < loop_len; i++)
00080     {
00081         m_eventCallbacks[event].m_eventList->at(i)->triggerCallback(EData, Flags);
00082     }
00083 }
